Navpreet Singh

Senior Full Stack Developer

About

Here is a little background

Navpreet is a certified AWS Cloud Practioner and a Full Stack Cloud Developer proficient in JS and Ruby on Rails framework with a decade of experience spearheading and architecting applications in NestJs, Typescript, NextJs, React, and Ruby on Rails.

He has demonstrated his expertise with apps that span industries, from real-time applications (web-sockets and MQTT) that allow multiple users to collaborate to e-commerce and food tech apps with a significant user base. His extensive knowledge of SQL (ORM) and NoSql (ODM) proves an asset in building scalable and high performing applications with good query response from databases. His experience with background jobs and handling cache efficiently helps applications to handle more traffic at the minimum required infrastructure on the cloud.

Experience

Ruby on Rails Developers

MealSuite Inc

Started work 2019-05-15 - Ended 2021-03-17

  • Developed a credit system for healthcare facilities for their departments, employees, customers and their family members to pay for meals in their food mess or restaurant.
  • Developed the core ledger system of above credit system to maintain sales, purchase, refund and discounts.
  • Integrated 3rd party application IMonnit (online wireless sensor portal) and Twilio to monitor sensors and send alerts via Email, SMS or call to relevant people as per the conditions set.
  • Developed various background jobs to do heavy data lifting and intensive operations like maintaining accurate ledger, bringing new facilities in the system with all the paid services included, and so on.
  • Integrated 3rd party DataCap System to handle credit card payments at the facilities.
  • Re-factored majority of the code and UI to improve user experience

Senior Software Developer

Started work 2017-05-15 - Ended 2018-06-21

  • Architected the products on IIOT, Factory Management, AI calendar to schedule meeting, and AI chat system.
  • Implemented CI/CD with automated testing on AWS ECS to maximize the uptime of all micro-services at the minimum required infrastructure.
  • Handled a team of 5 developers to develop various micro-services in Node.js, Python and Ruby on Rails.
  • Archited a solution to manage ORM migrations for different projects and tenants to different environments to minimize the errors of leaving some migration queries in the process to none.
  • Integrated ReCharts and D3.js in the analytical micro-service along with highly re-factored queries as store procedures to display charts in different time intervals.
  • Integrated various Google services (GMAIL, Maps, Analytics, and so on), which co-ordinates with core AI services for automated tasks on them.

Software Developer

Started work 2016-02-01 - Ended 2017-05-31

  • Created an application in Node.JS, which compare products on different eCommerce platforms and give insights to businesses on their products, competitor products, sales and offers on those sites, reviews of customers, ratings from customers etc.
  • Implemented Elastic-search in an eCommerce analytical application to improve UI experience of the user in terms of searching.

  • Worked on a financial project to manage the stock market portfolio of clients, individuals, and businesses. Have written some good store procedures in MySQL for optimized performance from the database.
  • Created many micro-services in Node.js to help technical analytics to give inputs for analysing stocks and provide chart insights of different strategies in one go.

Projects

Mealsuite

Software Developer

Mealsuite is a company in Food Tech domain where they provide their tech services from health facilities to restaurants in North America region. They manage the diet of each facility member (including their likes, dislikes and allergies) and helps manage the kitchen staff to prepare food for each member accordingly.

  • Manages the payment and discount solutions along with maintaining ledger of each facility.
  • Managing the staff, members and visitors of each facility.
  • Manages the food ordering and integrate it with core solution to make sure that each order is aligned with Doctor recommendations, likes, dislikes, and allergies of customer.
  • Auto-ordering feature which either curates the order from previous orders or order things as mentioned by customer in advance.
  • Monitor temperature in facilities store rooms and send alerts via Email, SMS or call to relevant people as per the conditions set.

Things Go Social Factory Management Suite

Senior Software Developer

Spearheaded the developement of a industrial IOT end to end service solution with real time monitoring and management for connected products, plants and systems to optimise operations throughout manufacturing ecosystem. Shipped and maintained the suites of products including

  • Discrete Production
  • Industry shopfloor management
  • Shopfloor Sensor Montioring
  • Inventory Management
  • Personnel Management
  • Infrastructure management system

Things Go Social Company Site

A dynamic company site which is in progress and being upgraded from PHP to (NestJS, React, Material UI and so on). To bring effects were the most challenging task with the first build in PHP. But as the site is revamping again in advanced technologies, focus in mainly on improving the user experience and adding extra features for SEO.

Eclipse: Hedge Fund Project

NodeJS developer

Eclipse is an application developed to manage portfolio of large hedge funds. It takes different scenarios by analytical manager to manage funds in different situations in the stock market. It was a huge project with a distributed team of 300 people. It's core was developed in JAVA and REST APIs in Nodejs and front-end in AngularJS. Various machine learning modules were integrated in core to manage the portfolio of each fund trying to provide positive returns in the long term. This project was earlier developed by Paxcel Technologies Pvt Ltd which was acquire by Prime TI, which was further acquired by Frontenac.

GIST: Range data in different time frames

A simple GIST to showcase the complex query written to fetch range data in different time frames from the DB.

E-Commerce Analytics

Software Developer

E-commerce Analytics is the core product of Paxcom Pvt Ltd. It is an e-commerce analytical tool which curates various e-commerce sites and find and list the different competitors along with their products.

  • Help companies to find the advance moves of the competitors like discounts and pricing change to remain ahead.
  • Curate the customer reviews and product ratings to help companies have a SWOT analysis of their products as well as their competitors.

GIST: Complex Elastic Search Query in NodeJS

A simple GIST to showcase the complex coding structure written with different abstract functions to achieve a common big goal.

Property App (Shoqah)

Back-end Ruby on Rails developer providing REST API's to mobile developers

This app was designed for a Saudi Arabian client who wanted a property app in their language i.e. Saudi. This app helps find property for sale and rent in a nearby location in Saudi Arabia.

HR Management (Clickapps)

Software Developer

HR management was a core application of Clickapps Pvt Ltd to manage the human resource of companies in Saudi Arabia as per the guidelines of government.

  • HR Management
  • Insurance Management
  • Tracking leaves of employees
  • Integrated Google Drive to manage the drive by different departments like HR, Finance and sales.

LinkYogi

Associate Software Developer

LinkYogi was a CRM product which curates news and find the relevant details like company and domain and shows the user their relevant LinkedIn connections in that company.

  • Curate news and filter relevant information like company and domain
  • Map the news with relevant LinkedIn connections of the user in the company
  • Integrate the 3rd party CRM tools to help sales team to manage things for single point of source.
